title: Designer Profile: Karen Walker
body:
_What’s your favourite colour?_

_Pink and purple and gold and black and white and silver and grey and also blue and also purple._

Karen Walker’s Spring ’13 eyewear collection was a glorious launch split into two halves: the first, modelled by elegant ladies aged between 65-92, and the second, by these little munchkins.

[![Karen 3](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/Karen-31.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/Karen-31.jpg)

We always wanted to do sort of a bookend campaign about optimism,” Walker told Style.com. “The first shoot was based on eternal optimism, and the second part is about the open-eyed, playful optimism that kids bring.”

Optimism is right – after seeing these four, I have never been so optimistic about the style trailblazers of the future. Give it 15+ years and I can definitely see Tyler, Claudia, Elise and Alice-Rose forming a new ultra-hip Primrose Hill set, based in some currently off-the-radar pocket of Zone 2, stepping out with the likes of [Suri Cruise](http://suricruisefashion.blogspot.co.uk/) and [Apple and Moses Martin](http://blogs.babble.com/famecrawler/files/2010/04/INFphoto_1239908.jpg).

For more insight into the collection and campaign, go to [http://www.karenwalkereyewear.com/](http://www.karenwalkereyewear.com/) where you can read interviews with these super-trendy tykes. There are some real gems in there.

[![Karen 6](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/Karen-61.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/Karen-61.jpg)

_![Karen 5](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/Karen-51.jpg)_
